quickFaq.question: What is JeuXP?
quickFaq.answer: JeuXP is a challenge center: you enter, play for 3 minutes per challenge, then step out! Your goal: beat your score, earn XP points, and reach all 5 levels.

quickFaq.question: Do I need to book in advance?
quickFaq.answer: No reservation is required. Just show up whenever you want and play!

quickFaq.question: How many people can play?
quickFaq.answer: You can play solo or in a team of 2 to 4 players.

quickFaq.question: What's the minimum age?
quickFaq.answer: Access is not permitted for children under 6 years old. Players under 12 years old must be accompanied by an adult. We recommend ages 16 and up to fully enjoy the experience.

quickFaq.question: How long does a challenge last?
quickFaq.answer: Each challenge lasts 3 minutes. You can play as many rounds as you want, depending on the time package you've chosen.

mission.title: Our Mission
content: At JeuXP, we have one simple mission: to create a unique space where adrenaline, challenges, and fun collide.

Inspired by over 100 escape games and challenge rooms tested around the world, we wanted to bring to Montreal a new generation of interactive entertainment â€” faster, more intense, and truly designed for today's youth.

Our ultra-short challenge rooms (3 minutes each) will put your reflexes, mind, and cardio to the test. Run, think, react, and earn XP to level up. It's fast, endlessly replayable, affordableâ€¦ and completely addictive.
JeuXP is more than just entertainment â€” it's a modern, immersive experience in the heart of Quebec's shopping malls.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Got questions? Here are the most common answers!

items.question: What is JeuXP?
items.answer: JeuXP is a challenge center: you enter, play for 3 minutes per challenge, then step out! Your goal: beat your score, earn XP points, and reach all 5 levels. Each room tests your reflexes, cardio, or precision.

items.question: Do I need to book in advance?
items.answer: No reservation is required. Just show up whenever you want and play!

items.question: How many people can play?
items.answer: You can play solo or in a team of 2 to 4 players.

items.question: What's the minimum age?
items.answer: Access is not permitted for children under 6 years old. Players under 12 years old must be accompanied by an adult. We recommend ages 16 and up to fully enjoy the experience.

items.question: Do I need to sign a waiver?
items.answer: Yes. A liability waiver must be signed upon arrival before playing.

items.question: What types of challenges are there?
items.answer: Speed, precision, coordinationâ€¦ each room offers a unique and immersive challenge.

items.question: How long does a challenge last?
items.answer: Each challenge lasts 3 minutes. You can play as many rounds as you want, depending on the time package you've chosen.

items.question: Can you see everything in one visit?
items.answer: No â€” and that's what makes it fun! The idea is to come back, discover new challenges, beat your score, and reach all 5 XP levels.

items.question: Are all rooms always open?
items.answer: Yes, except in cases of exceptional maintenance.

items.question: What should I wear?
items.answer: Wear comfortable clothes â€” light sportswear or casual. There's no specific dress code â€” what matters most is that you can move freely!

items.question: Can I leave and come back the same day?
items.answer: Yes, as long as your bracelet or pass is still valid, you can exit and return anytime during the day.

items.question: Do you have lockers?
items.answer: Yes, secure lockers are available to store your personal belongings while you play.

items.question: How can I make a reservation?
items.answer: For group reservations of 10 people or more, you can contact us: In person at the reception or by email at: contact@jeuxp.com

items.question: Do you host parties or private events?
items.answer: Yes! It's possible to reserve the entire space for a party, corporate event, or special activity. Check the Group Reservations section or contact us directly for more information.

items.question: Do you offer gift cards?
items.answer: Yes, gift cards are available directly at the reception.

items.question: What is your cancellation policy?
items.answer: Once your bracelet has been purchased, no refund is possible, except in the event of a major technical issue preventing the activity from taking place.

rules.title: Rules
items: Access to the games is reserved for participants aged 6 and older. Children under 12 must be accompanied by a responsible adult.
Access is prohibited to anyone under the influence of alcohol, drugs, or any substances affecting their faculties.
Participants must comply with staff directions at all times. Failure to do so may result in immediate expulsion without refund.
Any abusive use or intentional damage to equipment or rooms will result in charges for repair or replacement costs.
Participants must behave safely and respectfully toward other players and staff. Any behavior deemed dangerous, violent, or inappropriate may lead to expulsion without refund.

terms.title: Terms of Use
items: Participation in JeuXP activities is undertaken at the participants' own risk. While the games are designed to be safe, the operator cannot be held responsible for minor injuries, falls, or accidents that may occur during normal activity.
All ticket sales are final, non-refundable, and non-exchangeable, unless otherwise required by law. Displayed prices are before taxes.
The operator assumes no responsibility for any loss, theft, or damage to personal property incurred by participants while on the premises.
The operator reserves the right to expel any participant who fails to comply with the rules or engages in inappropriate behavior â€” without refund.
These Terms of Use are governed by the laws of Quebec. Any dispute shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of the judicial district of Montreal (Quebec).

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
items: JeuXP may collect certain personal information, including your name, email address, phone number, and details related to reservations and payments.
This information is used solely to manage reservations and payments, communicate with customers (confirmations, follow-ups, promotions), and ensure the safety and proper operation of our activities.
All information is securely stored and retained only for as long as necessary for the purposes for which it was collected. Access is limited to authorized JeuXP personnel.
